meanings.definition: The inner parts or organs of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: She felt a strange pain in her insides after eating too much candy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's insides using an X-ray machine.
meanings.sent3: When he heard the ghost story, he felt a chill in his insides.
meanings.sent4: Her insides twisted with anxiety as she waited for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The insides of the pumpkin were scooped out to make a jack-o'-lantern.

meanings.definition: The inner or hidden parts of something.
meanings.sent1: He carefully explored the insides of the old abandoned house.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the car by repairing its insides.
meanings.sent3: The insides of the mystery box turned out to be full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: She peeked into the insides of the envelope to see what was inside.
meanings.sent5: The insides of the computer were dusty and needed cleaning.
